title: 'Good for beginners and also for experts according to price'
body: I am just a beginner and it's my first colorful drawing ✨️ ☺️ The colours are just awesome But I didn't found the exact dark green, see the upper right corner of the image SO I used black to make it dark Product is really awesome 4 of The nibs broke when it fell down and spread all over It's unbreakable until someone uses his strength to break this Its a little stronger normal pencils Overall awesome 👌 Must buy it under 250 including delivery charges I paid 240 for this
